anarchy.name: Anarchy
anarchy.description: a form of government in which there is no authority or control

monarchy.name: Monarchy
monarchy.description: a form of government with a monarch at the head

democracy.name: Democracy
democracy.description: a system of government by the whole population or all the eligible members of a state, typically through elected representatives

dictatorship.name: Dictatorship
dictatorship.description: a form of government in which a person or a small group rules with almost unlimited power

republic.name: Republic
republic.description: a state in which supreme power is held by the people and their elected representatives

theocracy.name: Theocracy
theocracy.description: a system of government in which individuals rule in the name of God or a god

fascism.name: Fascism
fascism.description: a form of far-right, authoritarian ultranationalism characterized by dictatorial power, forcible suppression of opposition, and strong regimentation of society and of the economy

communism.name: Communism
communism.description: a political and economic ideology that seeks to establish a classless society in which the major means of production, such as mines and factories, are owned and controlled by the public

revolutionary.name: Revolutionary
revolutionary.description: a form of government in which the population or a large part of the population rises up in revolt against the current authorities, typically in a violent manner
